t: Amazon rebrands Amazon Go Grocery to Amazon Fresh, closes Seattle-area store near Microsoft HQ – GeekWire
s: May 18, 2021 - The Amazon Go Grocery in Redmond, Wash., is closing. (GeekWire Photo / Taylor Soper) The news: Amazon is renaming its Amazon Go Grocery brand to “Amazon Fresh” and closing its Amazon Go Grocery store in Redmond, Wash., near Microsoft’s headquarters, GeekWire has learned.

t: Amazon to scrap its Go Grocery store branding, close Redmond location | The Seattle Times
s: May 19, 2021 - Amazon is ditching the Amazon Go Grocery brand, closing one of its two Go Grocery stores and rechristening the other under its Amazon Fresh label, a move intended to reduce confusion about its multiple grocery brands.
